Don't listen to the RIAA bastards above with the whole 10 fps bullcrap. THis rip is perfect. Looks great, sounds great, and is one of the best films of 2006. Let them try and sow the seeds of doubt in our minds but we should remind ourselves whose community this is; Our's or Their's?

you have got to be frickin joking me. i have NO sound, and i am a real person, who just wants to see thisz movie.  niether of the discs have sound. the video part works fine, but no volume whatsoever! i hope i dont have to re torrent this. does anyone have a suggestion for another toreent for this movie?
Turn your speakers on.

my speakers are on, im not an idiot. i have sound on every other movie, but not this one. and for the record, my computer is hooked up to home stereo speakers, if there was any sound id hear it. this just has no audio whatsoever for me

Just download the AC3 codec, because without that you dont have audio for AC3 films. I had the same problem and fixed it that way

Greets from Amsterdam

The frame rate is slow :(  I had the same problem when I ripped,  I didn't have enough box.  what greatly improved my rips where more mem and a seperate sound card in the pci slot.  don't forget to turn off the onboard sound.  please please please try again you almost got it
Yes, the frame rate is way off and thier are some bullets fireing in the second cd out of nowhere.  It was really annoying
This release not nuked!!

This is one of the weirdest rips I have ever seen.

It is good quality visually, but the audio is messed up.. I have all the right stuff installed, it's the actual audio that's messed up.

It gets slightly out of sync in places, and towards the end has music and sound from different parts of the movie playing with the current audio track..

I would recommend not downloading this copy.
CD2 has fucked up audio in the most important parts. Frame rate is fine on VLC for Windows.

This is a nuked release, the persons saying that it isn't are lying for some reason.

Maybe they are industry people? that are trying to get people to bye a copy when they find out that the pirated copy has poor quality.
I downloaded this, video seems kinda off, and there are sounds and music that happen like 10-15 minutes before they are supposed to happen in the movie.
Video is choppy when the camera is panning. Audio is 6ch but some channels are out of sync in spots. I recommend downloading a different rip.
Video is choppy when the camera is panning. Audio is 6ch but some channels are out of sync in cd2. I recommend downloading a different rip.
